dataJson.description: A project built for freecodecamp.com in 2016, the requirement then were to build a leaderboard. freecode camp's API does not work the same any longer
dataJson.name: Freecodecamp Leaderboard
dataJson.story: The infamous React Ajax. It took a while to make it work. Here is where I have learned about a React Component Specs and Lifecycle. I have read and re read the React docs and  stackoverflow until I got it. This project is also the one that I really studied the bootstrap grid system. Here is where I also learned about .bind(this).
